entry.string: You are already subscribed to this event.
entry.translation: Yuoo ere-a elreedy soobscreebed tu thees ifent. Um de hur de hur de hur.

entry.string: If you wish you can use the link below to unsubscribe from this event.
entry.translation: Iff yuoo veesh yuoo cun use-a zee leenk beloo tu unsoobscreebe-a frum thees ifent.
